messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigator represses the memory?
The investigator does not become insane.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the INT roll succeeds?
The investigator goes temporarily insane.
You are a helpful assistant.
How long do the effects of temporary insanity last?
1D10 hours
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of the investigator recognizing the full significance of what has been seen or experienced?
The investigator goes temporarily insane.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigator's INT roll succeeds?
The investigator recognizes the full significance of what has been seen or experienced and goes temporarily insane.
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does temporary insanity last?
1D10 hours
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when an investigator loses a fifth or more of their Sanity points in one game day?
The investigator becomes indefinitely insane
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does indefinite insanity last?
Until the character is cured or recovers
You are a helpful assistant.
How does the Keeper define a 'day'?
A 'day' is defined by the Keeper as lasting until the investigator reaches a place of safety where they can rest and recover their wits.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to an investigator when their Sanity points reach zero?
When Sanity points are reduced to zero, the investigator becomes permanently and incurably insane and ceases to be a player character.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can anyone recover from insanity in the real world?
No, in the real world, all insanity is considered indefinite insanity, and recovery is unlikely.
You are a helpful assistant.
What often happens to a narrator in Lovecraft's stories after a lifetime of madness?
A lifetime of madness often follows the narrator in Lovecraft's stories.
You are a helpful assistant.
What can be the outcome for a character in Lovecraft's story if they have a congenital condition?
Little hope of recovery
You are a helpful assistant.
What should a Keeper work out in the game?
The end-point of madness
You are a helpful assistant.
What might happen to a character who is released from an asylum?
They can attempt to regain some semblance of their former life
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the narrator of the story considering doing in response to their condition?
Blowing out their brains for fear they shall be mangled like St John
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the first phase of insanity in the investigator?
a short bout of madness
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the duration of the first phase of insanity?
hours
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the second phase of insanity in the investigator?
a longer period of underlying insanity
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does the second phase of insanity typically last?
months
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the two distinct phases of insanity in Lovecraft's The Hound?
Two distinct phases of insanity: phase one (short bout of madness) and phase two (underlying insanity).
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does phase one of insanity last in the case of temporary insanity?
Hours
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the investigator's control during phase one of insanity?
The control of the investigator is handed from the player to the Keeper for a short amount of real-world time.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the term for the short bout of madness experienced by the investigator during phase one?
The red mist, frenzy, freak out, and panic attack.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to control of the investigator during a bout of madness?
The control of the investigator is handed from the player to the Keeper.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is protected for the investigator during a bout of madness?
The investigator cannot lose further Sanity points.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to subsequent horrors during a bout of madness?
Any subsequent horrors are either forgotten or later believed to be a manifestation of the madness.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is limited about the protection for the investigator during a bout of madness?
The protection is limited.
